oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Disulfide and diselenides of bis(phosphines) derived from N,Nâ€²-substituted ethylenediamines. The crystal and molecular structure of Ph2P(S)N(Ph)CH2CH2N(Ph)P(S)Ph2
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
MAGUE, JOEL T
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: spectra
derivatives
x-ray crystallography
crystal structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reactions of bis(diphosphino)ethylenediamine derivatives, [Ph2PN(R)CH2]2 (R=CH3, CH2Ph or Ph) with elemental sulfur and selenium afford the corresponding disulfide or diselenide derivatives in good yield. All compounds have been characterized by elemental analysis, NMR (31P and 1H) and IR spectroscopic data. The structure of one of the disulfide derivative, [Ph2P(S)N(Ph)CH2]2 is determined by X-ray crystallography.
